review_text: Everything was perfect! Quite, cozy place to relax.
tags: Business trip~Solo traveller~Junior Suite~Stayed 1 night~Submitted via mobile
suggestion: We're delighted to hear that you had a perfect stay with us! It's wonderful that you found our hotel to be a quiet and cozy place to relax. As a Silver Member, we appreciate your loyalty and would like to thank you for choosing our hotel. Since you've shown interest in yoga classes, we'd be happy to offer you a complimentary yoga session during your next stay. We look forward to welcoming you back and providing another exceptional experience.

review_title: I highly recommend this b&b! We enjoyed it a lot!

review_text:
It was just what we wanted for a week by the beach in winter,

Location was fab, apartment quiet and very well-equipped. Spotless clean.

review_title: My stay in the house was a experiencing bliss in luxury. The house is sheer touch of beauty wrapped
review_text: My stay in the house was a experiencing bliss in luxury. The house is sheer touch of beauty wrapped by luxury and complimented with kindness and care  from Lisbette & her parents making it a most remarkable stay.
tags: Business trip~Solo traveller~Junior Suite~Stayed 4 nights~Submitted via mobile
suggestion: We're absolutely delighted to hear that your stay with us was a truly blissful experience! It's wonderful to know that the luxury and beauty of our house, combined with the kindness and care of Lisbette and her parents, made your stay truly unforgettable. We're thrilled that you felt so well taken care of. As you mentioned budget-friendliness as one of your preferences, we'd like to let you know that we offer special packages and promotions throughout the year

review_title: One bedroom apartment with wonderful view and free, secure parking, but not close enough  to the main beach area.
review_text:
The building itself has a very musty smell in the hallway (despite being built in 1988), but the apartment itself smells good, which makes it bearable. 
When showering, the hot water goes off every 2-3 minutes for about 20-30 seconds and then only cold water comes out. The hot water then comes back again. This should be checked out. That is the only thing we didn’t like about the apartment. ,

The view was great, the apartment furnished in a modern style and equipped with everything you may need. The apartment was clean. 
There is free, secure parking outside in the building’s parking lot or downstairs in the garage. 
Jan always responded promptly to all messages sent via Booking.com messenger.
tags: Leisure trip~People with friends~Apartment with Sea View~Stayed 4 nights~Submitted via mobile
